ygData.subject: SR
ygData.msgSnippet: The spells say level 61 because they had no other way to keep the hybrid class s from buying the spells.  If there were no hybrid class s spells would say
ygData.messageBody:
The spells say level 61 because they had no other way to keep the hybrid
class's from buying the spells. If there were no hybrid class's spells
would say unusable to whatever class......I had an SK buy a Necro spell
and it said the same thing......thats just Verants way of saying you
can't use this.

Druid's can do spells research...Shaman, Rangers, SK's, and Paladins I
don't believe can.

Spells I hope won't cross over. As someone said before....there would
be no point in having the different class's if you could learn any spell
you wanted from any class's spell list. I picked my class cause I liked
what it had to offer. Obviously other class's have spells I want....but
thats part of the sacarafice.

Cilk
